snippet: A court in Seoul sentenced an American soldier on Wednesday to six years in prison for raping a South Korean teenage girl last year.
abstract: Court in Seoul, South Korea, sentences Pvt Kevin Robinson, an American soldier, to six years in prison for raping a South Korean teenage girl in 2011; case stokes anti-American sentiment and prompts an apology from American officials, coming as it does on the heels of a similar decision in November 2011 in a separate assault.
lead_paragraph: A court in Seoul sentenced an American soldier on Wednesday to six years in prison for raping a South Korean teenage girl last year.

headline.main: South Korea: U.S. Soldier Receives 6-Year Sentence in Rape of Teenager
headline.print_headline: South Korea: U.S. Soldier Receives 6-Year Sentence in Rape of Teenager
